mapper.select: SELECT hr.id, hr.reason, hp.value AS `healthParamBinaryValue`, hr.status FROM t_data_health_reason hr INNER JOIN t_data_health_package_param hp ON hp.id = hr.healthPackageParamId INNER JOIN t_data_health_package_param_relation r ON r.healthPackageParamId = hp.id INNER JOIN t_data_health_package h ON h.id = r.healthPackageId WHERE h.value = #{healthPackageBinaryValue} AND hr.professional = #{professional}
